3878,76796214,Trying to connect ASPNET Core WebAPI to new Ubuntu Server 22.04 Database for an Angular Project,"

I know this has been asked a few times on these boards so I am sorry to post another one. Also, this is my first time posting so I'm nervous but mostly, I am so confused. I have an Angular 16 frontend website that uses ASPNET.Core 7 backend which **USED **to connect to a MSSQL database locally. I have recently purchased a server and I'm trying to get it running.
• Do I still use Cors() in my Program.cs?
// Learn more about configuring Swagger/OpenAPI at https://aka.ms/aspnetcore/swashbuckle
The dotnet ef migration add InitialCreate works fine.
When I get to updating the database:
